Meet the Team

Dr. Afsah Anwar

Faculty Advisor / PI

Founder of LoboSec. Leads the initiative to develop practical cybersecurity skills and build a strong student community at UNM.

Enrique Sobrados

CTF Team Leader

Ph.D. student at UNM. Drives strategy, organizes competitions, and supports team members across challenges from reverse engineering to web exploitation.
